data.lyric:
[ti:All Night Parking (with Erroll Garner) Interlude]
[ar:Adele/Erroll Garner]
[al:30]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.86]All Night Parking (with Erroll Garner) Interlude - Adele/Erroll Garner
[00:03.30]Lyrics by：Adele Adkins/Erroll Garner
[00:04.93]Composed by：Adele Adkins/Erroll Garner
[00:06.41]
[00:29.78]I know you've got things to do
[00:34.26]I do too
[00:35.33]
[00:37.21]I just wanna spend all my time with you
[00:41.78]It feels so good
[00:43.03]I'm so hard to impress
[00:44.94]Don't leave me on this stretch alone
[00:49.29]
[00:50.58]When I'm out at a party
[00:52.88]I'm just excited to get home
[00:57.11]And dream about you all night long
[01:03.87]
[01:06.32]I don't know how you got through to me
[01:11.28]
[01:11.81]I'm so cold
[01:13.00]
[01:14.74]It's all happening so easily
[01:18.89]Like oh my God
[01:20.56]It's so hard to digest usually I'm best alone
[01:26.41]
[01:27.78]But every time that you text
[01:29.65]I want to get on the next flight home
[01:34.10]
[01:35.00]And dream next to you all night long
[01:42.14]
[01:43.72]Maybe it's the way you remind me of
[01:48.28]
[01:48.92]Where I come from
[01:50.49]
[01:52.23]Or how you make me feel beautiful
[01:56.16]
[01:56.74]And then some
[01:58.04]The sight of you is dramatic one glimpse and I panic inside
[02:04.15]
[02:05.39]I get lost in our hours
[02:07.66]'Cause you possess powers I can't fight
[02:11.81]That's why I dream about you all night long
[02:19.75]
[02:21.77]All night long
[02:26.84]
[02:27.51]All night
data.trans:
[ti:All Night Parking (with Erroll Garner) Interlude]
[ar:Adele/Erroll Garner]
[al:30]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.86]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.30]//
[00:04.93]//
[00:06.41]
[00:29.78]我知道你有自己的事情需要忙碌
[00:34.26]我也没有闲着
[00:35.33]
[00:37.21]我只希望每分每秒都能与你共度
[00:41.78]沉浸于幸福里
[00:43.03]我费尽心机赢得你的欢心 
[00:44.94]不要把我一个人晾着
[00:49.29]
[00:50.58]当我外出参加派对
[00:52.88]只有快要回家的时候我才觉得激动
[00:57.11]在梦里与你相逢 将漫漫长夜熬过
[01:03.87]
[01:06.32]我不知道你是如何让我的心融化
[01:11.28]
[01:11.81]我冷若冰霜
[01:13.00]
[01:14.74]一切是这样自然而然
[01:18.89]只能发表一声惊叹
[01:20.56]难以适应接纳了另一个人的生活 通常我更习惯与孤独相处
[01:26.41]
[01:27.78]但每一次你发来信息
[01:29.65]我只想立马坐上飞机赶回家中
[01:34.10]
[01:35.00]在你身旁进入梦乡 直到天明
[01:42.14]
[01:43.72]或许是因为你让我想起 
[01:48.28]
[01:48.92]我的家乡
[01:50.49]
[01:52.23]或者是因为你让我感觉到美妙
[01:56.16]
[01:56.74]还有其他美好的事
[01:58.04]在你身边总是那般不可思议 只是一瞥 我的心就犹如小鹿乱撞般
[02:04.15]
[02:05.39]我迷失于你我共度的时光里
[02:07.66]因为你所拥有的魅力 我无法抗拒
[02:11.81]所以你会出现在我的梦里 直到天亮 我睁开眼睛
[02:19.75]
[02:21.77]整夜梦见你
[02:26.84]
[02:27.51]整夜
